title: Backend Developer Portfolio
summary: Experienced backend developer with 5+ years of expertise in designing and optimizing scalable, high-performance web applications.
experience: Architected and maintained high-performance web applications using Node.js and React.
Optimized SQL and NoSQL databases for scalability, ensuring minimal latency and high availability.
Implemented event-driven architectures and queue-based services using RabbitMQ.
Integrated ElasticSearch for full-text search and analytics in large-scale applications.
Designed API gateways and middleware for secure, efficient communication between services.
